templateOptions.label: UserName
templateOptions.description: The UserName to connect to the API

templateOptions.label: Password
templateOptions.description: The password to connect to the API

templateOptions.label: BaseUrl
templateOptions.description: The URL to the API. Example: 'https://ws.regas.nl/regasamnis'

templateOptions.label: PowerShellModulePath
templateOptions.description: The path of the Powershell Module, Example: 'C:\install\Myneva.psm1'

templateOptions.label: FilePathDLL
templateOptions.description: The path of the Low level DLL, Example: 'C:\install\Regas.dll'
